name: Kepler Delivery Inc
description:
Get the most points by busting asteroids, collecting fuel and letters, and delivering packages in LettuceMan Studios first (finished) game!

When you collect a full set of letters, you unlock an ability! Dash to move quickly, Shotgun to fire a spread shot, and shield to save from from one impact.

CONTROLS

  • w & s: go forward and backward
  • a & d: turn left and right
  • left mouse: fire shot
  • space: use dash (when applicable)
